original: gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not something else.

original: 'jug pa'i rgyu las sems 'jug pa rnam par chad par yang mi rigs la /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i rgyu las sems 'jug pa rnam par chad par yang mi rigs la /
translated: It is not reasonable that mind engages due to the cause of engagement being interrupted.

original: sems kyang sems 'jug pa'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: sems kyang sems 'jug pa'i rgyu yin te /
translated: And mind is the cause of the engagement of mind.

original: de'i phyir mar me la rlung ltar sems la yang mi 'jug pa'i rgyu gzhan kho na zhig khas blang bar bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir mar me la rlung ltar sems la yang mi 'jug pa'i rgyu gzhan kho na zhig khas blang bar bya'o zhe na /
translated: Therefore, like a lamp and wind, one should accept that there is another cause of the nonengagement of mind.

original: de'i phyir / de dang 'gal ba'i rten bskyod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / de dang 'gal ba'i rten bskyod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: To respond: Because it generates a basis that is incompatible with it.

original: sems skye ba dang 'gal ba'i rten bskyed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sems skye ba dang 'gal ba'i rten bskyed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is said that because it generates a basis that is incompatible with the arising of mind.

original: mar mes sdong bu la rag las pa ltar sems 'jug pa ni rten la rag las te /
analyzed: mar mes sdong bu la rag las pa ltar sems 'jug pa ni rten la rag las te /
translated: Like a lamp that depends on a wick, the engagement of mind depends on a basis.

original: de'i phyir rten nyams pas sems mi 'jug par mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: de'i phyir rten nyams pas sems mi 'jug par mi 'gal lo //
translated: Therefore it is not contradictory that mind does not engage because its basis degenerates.

original: rten nyams pa de ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems kyis byed de /
analyzed: rten nyams pa de ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems kyis byed de /
translated: The generation of that basis is done by the mind of meditative attainment.

original: de'i phyir snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems kho na de la gegs byed pa'i phyir ro zhes de skad du bshad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems kho na de la gegs byed pa'i phyir ro zhes de skad du bshad do //
translated: Therefore it is said that the mind of meditative attainment alone is the obstruction to it.

original: de la snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de la snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: The expression “to enter into” refers to the non-functioning of thought.

original: sems mi 'jug pa de la snyoms par 'jug pa zhes gdags so //
analyzed: sems mi 'jug pa de la snyoms par 'jug pa zhes gdags so //
translated: The non-functioning of thought is designated as “to enter into.

original: de gdags pa'i nye bar len pa go gang zhig yin /
analyzed: de gdags pa'i nye bar len pa go gang zhig yin /
translated: ” What is the appropriated object of this designation?

original: nye bar len pa med pa ni cung zad kyang btags par mod pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: nye bar len pa med pa ni cung zad kyang btags par mod pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: It is not possible to designate anything without an appropriated object.

original: sems gang dag mi 'jug pa de dag de mi 'jug pa'i nye bar len pa yin no //
analyzed: sems gang dag mi 'jug pa de dag de mi 'jug pa'i nye bar len pa yin no //
translated: The non-functioning of those thoughts is the appropriated object of the non-functioning of thought.

original: gal te ma skyes @174b pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin pa de dag ji ltar na btags pa'i nye bar len par rung zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ma skyes @174b pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin pa de dag ji ltar na btags pa'i nye bar len par rung zhe na /
translated: If they do not exist because they are unarisen, how can they be the appropriated object of the designation?

original: ma 'ongs pa yin yang sems la gnas pa de dag ni mi 'jug pa'i nye bar len pa nyid du yod de /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa yin yang sems la gnas pa de dag ni mi 'jug pa'i nye bar len pa nyid du yod de /
translated: Even though they are future, they exist as the appropriated object of the non-functioning of thought because they are based on thought.🔽For example,

original: dper na / rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams ma byung zhing //
analyzed: dper na / rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams ma byung zhing //
translated: when the perfect buddhas do not appear

original: nyan thos rnams kyang zad pa na //
analyzed: nyan thos rnams kyang zad pa na //
translated: and the śrāvakas have disappeared,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni //
translated: the wisdom of the pratyekabuddhas

original: brten pa med par rab tu 'byung //🔽zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: brten pa med par rab tu 'byung //🔽zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: arises without dependence on another.

original: der ni sangs rgyas ma 'ongs pa blo la gnas pa rnams kho na mi 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: der ni sangs rgyas ma 'ongs pa blo la gnas pa rnams kho na mi 'byung ba yin te /
translated: In that case, only future buddhas that exist in the mind do not occur,

original: ma skyes pa'i sangs rgyas ni yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i sangs rgyas ni yod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: but a nonarisen buddha does not exist.

original: nyan thos rnams kyang zhig cing blo la gnas pa rnams kho na zad par brjod kyi /
analyzed: nyan thos rnams kyang zhig cing blo la gnas pa rnams kho na zad par brjod kyi /
translated: Also, only the minds of śrāvakas that have ceased and exist in the mind are said to be exhausted,

original: da ltar pa rnams ni ma yin no //
analyzed: da ltar pa rnams ni ma yin no //
translated: but not those that are present.

original: de'i phyir 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa yod pa ma yin yang zhig pa dang ma skyes pa dag blo la gnas pa kho na btags pa'i nye bar len pa yin par mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa yod pa ma yin yang zhig pa dang ma skyes pa dag blo la gnas pa kho na btags pa'i nye bar len pa yin par mi 'gal lo //
translated: Therefore, although the past and future do not exist, it is not contradictory to impute the mere cessation of the mind and the mere nonarising of the mind to be the appropriated aggregates.

original: gal te snyoms par 'jug pa ma 'ongs pa'i sems mi 'jug pa tsam yin la /🔽de yang dngos po med pa yin pas 'dus ma byas su 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te snyoms par 'jug pa ma 'ongs pa'i sems mi 'jug pa tsam yin la / de yang dngos po med pa yin pas 'dus ma byas su 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If meditative attainment is the mere nonarising of the future mind,🔽then it is a nonthing and thus unconditioned.

original: de'i phyir / mi 'jug pa tsam de yang zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir / mi 'jug pa tsam de yang zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
translated: To respond: That mere nonarising is also a nonthing🔽that is imputed to the mind.

original: 'dir gang gi dbang du byas nas 'dus byas zhes brjod pa /
analyzed: 'dir gang gi dbang du byas nas 'dus byas zhes brjod pa /
translated: Here, in terms of what is it said that it is conditioned?

original: mi 'jug pa tsam zhes bya ba 'dus byas grub par gyur pa ni cung zad kyang med de /
analyzed: mi 'jug pa tsam zhes bya ba 'dus byas grub par gyur pa ni cung zad kyang med de /
translated: Mere nonengagement is not a conditioned state.

original: 'on kyang snyoms par 'jug pa sngon dang phyis med pas mi 'jug pa tsam gyis snyoms pa ra 'jug pa la 'dus byas su gdags so //
analyzed: 'on kyang snyoms par 'jug pa sngon dang phyis med pas mi 'jug pa tsam gyis snyoms pa ra 'jug pa la 'dus byas su gdags so //
translated: However, it is designated as a conditioned state due to mere nonengagement in meditative attainment, since meditative attainment does not exist prior to or subsequent to it.

original: yang na rten nyid ces bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: yang na rten nyid ces bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: Or else, the basis itself is the meditative attainment.

original: sngar ni tha snyad kyi sgo nas sems mi 'jug pa tsam snyoms par 'jug pa nyid yin pa dang / 'dus byas nyid du bshad pa la ;
analyzed: sngar ni tha snyad kyi sgo nas sems mi 'jug pa tsam snyoms par 'jug pa nyid yin pa dang / 'dus byas nyid du bshad pa la ;
translated: Previously, it was explained that meditative attainment is merely the nonengagement of mind from the conventional perspective and that it is a conditioned state.

original: da lta ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis gnas skabs gzhan thob pa'i rten nyid snyoms par 'jug pa yin te /
analyzed: da lta ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis gnas skabs gzhan thob pa'i rten nyid snyoms par 'jug pa yin te /
translated: Now, it is explained that meditative attainment is the basis itself that obtains a different state through the power of meditative attainment.

original: de'i phyir gnas skabs kyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir snyoms par 'jug pa 'dus byas yin no zhes bya bar bshad par 'gyur //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas skabs kyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir snyoms par 'jug pa 'dus byas yin no zhes bya bar bshad par 'gyur //
translated: Therefore, it is explained that meditative attainment is a conditioned state because it is a specific state.

original: 'du shes med pa yang de bzhin du zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'du shes med pa yang de bzhin du zhes bya ba la /
translated: The same applies to the meditative attainment of nondiscernment.

original: ji ltar 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa btags pa tsam yin pa de bzhin du 'du shes med pa pa yang yin no //🔽rnal 'byor pa la ni de'i smon lam gyi 'phen pa'i shugs las snyoms par 'jug pa 'phangs pa chad na yid dang / chos dag la brten nas yid kyi rnam @175a * //
analyzed: ji ltar 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa btags pa tsam yin pa de bzhin du 'du shes med pa pa yang yin no // rnal 'byor pa la ni de'i smon lam gyi 'phen pa'i shugs las snyoms par 'jug pa 'phangs pa chad na yid dang / chos dag la brten nas yid kyi rnam @175a * //
translated: Just as the attainment of cessation is a mere designation, so too is the attainment of nonperception.

original: par shes pa skye la /
analyzed: par shes pa skye la /
translated: For the yogī, when the force of the impetus of the vow is exhausted, the attainment is projected by the mind and mental factors, and when the attainment is exhausted, the mind and mental factors arise in dependence on the body and the immediately antecedent condition.🔽The mind and mental factors arise in dependence on the body and the immediately antecedent condition.

original: 'du shes med pa par ni las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'phen pa zad pas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du shes med pa par ni las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'phen pa zad pas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the state of nonperception, death occurs through the exhaustion of the impetus of the karma that projects the rebirth.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa dag bstan zin to //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa dag bstan zin to //
translated: The attainments have been explained.

original: srog ni tshe yin /
analyzed: srog ni tshe yin /
translated: Life force is life.

original: 'di rnam grangs brjod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di rnam grangs brjod pa yin gyi /
translated: This is a synonym,

original: mtshan nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: not a definition,

original: bstan bcos las bstan pa'i dor byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos las bstan pa'i dor byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not mentioned in the treatise.

original: de nyid kyi phyir chos mngon pa las 'di skad du zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir chos mngon pa las 'di skad du zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore, it says in the Abhidharma:

original: rnam grangs ni grub na mtshan mar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam grangs ni grub na mtshan mar byed pa yin no //
translated: A synonym is that which is made into a sign when the meaning is established.

original: 'di ni srog dang 'dra bar grub bas 'dis srog gi don nges par mi nus te /
analyzed: 'di ni srog dang 'dra bar grub bas 'dis srog gi don nges par mi nus te /
translated: This is established as being like life force. Therefore, this does not definitely determine the meaning of life force.

original: de'i phyir / tshe zhes bya ba'i chos 'di gang yin pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir / tshe zhes bya ba'i chos 'di gang yin pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
translated: Hence, what is this dharma called life force?

original: drod dang ni /
analyzed: drod dang ni /
translated: It is heat and

original: rnam shes rten gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam shes rten gang yin pa'o //
translated: the support of consciousness.

original: zhes bya ba de 'bras bu'i sgo nas 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba de 'bras bu'i sgo nas 'chad pa'o //
translated: This is explained from the perspective of the result.

original: gnas pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnas pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The cause of duration is

original: rten du gyur pa zhes bya ba rnam par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rten du gyur pa zhes bya ba rnam par bshad pa'o //
translated: the support.

original: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: ji srid du tshe yod pa de srid du 'di gnyis rgyun chags su 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: ji srid du tshe yod pa de srid du 'di gnyis rgyun chags su 'jug pa yin no //
translated: As long as life force exists, these two continuously function.

original: da ni tshe de'i rten du gyur pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
analyzed: da ni tshe de'i rten du gyur pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
translated: Now, the support of that life force is mentioned.

original: gnas pa'i rgyu gang yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnas pa'i rgyu gang yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: What is the cause of duration?

original: drod dang rnam par shes pa de dag nyid yin no zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
analyzed: drod dang rnam par shes pa de dag nyid yin no zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
translated: It is heat and consciousness.

original: tshe ni de dag la rag las te gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshe ni de dag la rag las te gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Life force is supported by them.

original: 'o na ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /🔽gang dag la phan tshun ltos te 'jug pa yod pa de dag ni phan tshun ltos te 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: 'o na ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la / gang dag la phan tshun ltos te 'jug pa yod pa de dag ni phan tshun ltos te 'jug pa'o //
translated: But if you say that heat and consciousness are the supports of life,🔽then they would be mutually dependent,

original: de'i dngos po ni phan tshun ltos te 'jug pa nyid de /
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni phan tshun ltos te 'jug pa nyid de /
translated: and the error of mutual dependence would ensue.🔽If they are mutually dependent, then they would not be the supports of life.

original: phan tshun ltos te 'jug pa ni de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun ltos te 'jug pa ni de'i phyir ro //
translated: But if you say that they are the supports of life because they are mutually dependent,🔽then life would not be dependent on heat and consciousness,🔽and life would not be dependent on heat and consciousness.🔽But if you say that life is dependent on heat and consciousness,

original: de dag las ni drod dang rnam pa shes pa dang / tshe gsum las so //
analyzed: de dag las ni drod dang rnam pa shes pa dang / tshe gsum las so //
translated: then life would not be dependent on heat and consciousness.

original: gang zhig sngar ldog par 'gyur te zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: gang zhig sngar ldog par 'gyur te zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: But if you say that life is dependent on heat and consciousness,

original: tshe ma log par gzhan dag ldog pa med la /
analyzed: tshe ma log par gzhan dag ldog pa med la /
translated: then life would not be dependent on heat and consciousness.🔽But if you say that life is dependent on heat and consciousness,🔽then life would not be dependent on heat and consciousness.🔽But if you say that life is dependent on heat and consciousness,

original: gzhan dag ldog pa med par yang tshe ldog pa med pas rtag tu ldog pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag ldog pa med par yang tshe ldog pa med pas rtag tu ldog pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then life would not be dependent on heat and consciousness.🔽But if you say that life is dependent on heat and consciousness,

original: de'i phyir de dag phan tshun rten nyid du mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag phan tshun rten nyid du mi rung ngo //
translated: then life would not be dependent on heat and consciousness.🔽But if you say that life is dependent on heat and consciousness,🔽then life would not be dependent on heat and consciousness.🔽But if you say that life is dependent on heat and consciousness,🔽then life would not be dependent on heat and consciousness.🔽But if you say that life is dependent on heat and consciousness,🔽then life would not be dependent on heat and consciousness.🔽But if you say that life is dependent on heat and consciousness,🔽then life would not be dependent on heat and consciousness.🔽But if you say that life is dependent on heat and consciousness,🔽then life would not be dependent on heat and consciousness.🔽But if you say that life is dependent on heat and consciousness,🔽then life would not be dependent on heat and consciousness.🔽But if you say that life is dependent on heat and consciousness,🔽then life would not be dependent on heat and consciousness.🔽But if you say that life is dependent on heat and consciousness,🔽then life would not be dependent on heat and consciousness.🔽But if you say that life is dependent on heat and consciousness,🔽then life would not be dependent on heat and consciousness.🔽But if you say that life is dependent on heat and consciousness,🔽then life would not be dependent on heat and consciousness.

original: 'o na ni tshe'i rten du gyur pa ni las yin gyi /
analyzed: 'o na ni tshe'i rten du gyur pa ni las yin gyi /
translated: But if you say that life is dependent on heat and consciousness,

original: drod dang rnam par shes pa dag ni ma yin no //
analyzed: drod dang rnam par shes pa dag ni ma yin no //
translated: then life would not be dependent on heat and consciousness.🔽But if you say

original: de ltar na las kyi 'phen pa zad pas tshe ldog la /
analyzed: de ltar na las kyi 'phen pa zad pas tshe ldog la /
translated: Thus, since the projection of karma is exhausted, life is reversed.

original: de ldog pas drod dang rnam par shes pa dag ldog pas rtag tu ldog pa med par thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ldog pas drod dang rnam par shes pa dag ldog pas rtag tu ldog pa med par thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Since that is reversed, heat and consciousness are reversed, and it is not the case that they are always not reversed.

original: ji ltar las tshe'i rten du gyur pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar las tshe'i rten du gyur pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is karma the support of life?

original: de'i phyir / las kyis ji srid du 'phangs pa de srid du rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / las kyis ji srid du 'phangs pa de srid du rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: To explain, he says: because it operates for as long as it is projected by karma.

original: de rjes su 'jug pa ni las kyi 'phen @175b pa'i rgyu can yin no //
analyzed: de rjes su 'jug pa ni las kyi 'phen @175b pa'i rgyu can yin no //
translated: Its operation is caused by the projection of karma.

original: drod dang rnam par shes pa dag gi rten du gyur pa yang las kho na yin par ci'i phyir mi 'dod de /
analyzed: drod dang rnam par shes pa dag gi rten du gyur pa yang las kho na yin par ci'i phyir mi 'dod de /
translated: Why not accept that karma alone is the support of heat and consciousness?

original: srog gi dbang po dang cig car skye ba'i phyir dang / 'jig pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: srog gi dbang po dang cig car skye ba'i phyir dang / 'jig pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: Because it is simultaneous with the faculty of life force and because it is destroyed.

original: ma shi'i bar du rnam par shes pa thams cad ces bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: ma shi'i bar du rnam par shes pa thams cad ces bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: All consciousness until death, etc.

original: rnam par shes pa las kyis ji srid 'phangs pa de srid du rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir srog ltar las kyi rten can du 'gyur na ni de ltar na ma shi'i bar du rnam par shes pa dge ba dang / nyon mongs pa can dang /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las kyis ji srid 'phangs pa de srid du rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir srog ltar las kyi rten can du 'gyur na ni de ltar na ma shi'i bar du rnam par shes pa dge ba dang / nyon mongs pa can dang /
translated: If that were so, then until death, consciousness would be karmic maturation, whether it is virtuous or afflicted,

original: spyod lam pa dang / bzo'i gnas pa dang / sprul pa pa thams cad srog bzhin du rnam par smin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyod lam pa dang / bzo'i gnas pa dang / sprul pa pa thams cad srog bzhin du rnam par smin par 'gyur ro //
translated: whether it is in the state of composure that is a cessation or in the state of composure without conception, whether it is in the state of the four types of action, or whether it is in the state of emanating.

original: 'o na drod kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'o na drod kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: If you say that heat is the basis of consciousness,

original: srog gi dbang po dang lhan cig skye ba dang / 'gag pa'i phyir dang / lung du ma bstan pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i ngo bor 'gal ba med pas /🔽drod kyi rten du gyur pa las yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srog gi dbang po dang lhan cig skye ba dang / 'gag pa'i phyir dang / lung du ma bstan pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i ngo bor 'gal ba med pas / drod kyi rten du gyur pa las yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: then heat is not contradictory to being the entity of karmic maturation because it arises and ceases simultaneously with the faculty of life force and because it is neutral.🔽Therefore it would be the basis of karma.

original: de lta na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de lta na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
translated: If that were so, then consciousness would not be the basis of heat.

original: drod med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: drod med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because there would be no heat.

original: drod ni me'i khams yin na /
analyzed: drod ni me'i khams yin na /
translated: If heat is the fire element,

original: 'byung ba dag ni gzugs med pa'i khams na yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'byung ba dag ni gzugs med pa'i khams na yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The primary elements do not exist in the formless realm.

original: drod med pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i rnam par shes pa de'i rten ni las yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: drod med pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i rnam par shes pa de'i rten ni las yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: The support of that formless consciousness would be karma, because there is no heat.

original: gang la lar ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la ;
analyzed: gang la lar ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la ;
translated: In some places, etc.

original: dngos po rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i sgo nas 'brel pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i sgo nas 'brel pa ma yin te /
translated: The nature of things as cause and effect is not related by desire, because it is due to the nature of cause and effect.

original: de'i phyir thams cad du thams cad kyi tshe /
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad du thams cad kyi tshe /
translated: Therefore, at all times and in all circumstances,🔽the nature of cause and effect is not mistaken.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po 'khrul pa med do snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po 'khrul pa med do snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: This is the thought.

original: bshad zin to zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: bshad zin to zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: We have already explained, etc.

original: srog bzhin du rnam par shes pa las la brten pa nyid yin na ni gzugs med pa dag na rnam par shes pa nyon mongs pa can dang / dge ba med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srog bzhin du rnam par shes pa las la brten pa nyid yin na ni gzugs med pa dag na rnam par shes pa nyon mongs pa can dang / dge ba med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If consciousness were supported by karma, like life, then afflicted and virtuous consciousness would not exist in the formless realm.

original: de lta bas na de gnyis kyi rten du gyur pa'i tshe na yod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na de gnyis kyi rten du gyur pa'i tshe na yod pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, it exists at the time when it is the support of those two.

original: 'jig rten dang bstan bcos dag dang 'gal ba'i phyir med do zhes ni mi smra mod kyi rdzas gzhan ni med do zhes smra'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten dang bstan bcos dag dang 'gal ba'i phyir med do zhes ni mi smra mod kyi rdzas gzhan ni med do zhes smra'o //
translated: We do not say that it does not exist because it contradicts the world and the treatises, but we do say that it is not a separate substance.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?🔽Because its own nature and effect are not ascertained.

original: rang gi ngo bo dang 'bras bu nges par ma zin pa'i phyir ro zhes sngar bshad pa'i gtan tshigs kho na'i rjes su bsnyeg go //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo dang 'bras bu nges par ma zin pa'i phyir ro zhes sngar bshad pa'i gtan tshigs kho na'i rjes su bsnyeg go //
translated: We follow the same reason that was explained earlier.

original: gal te rdzas gzhan ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te rdzas gzhan ma yin na /
translated: If it is not a separate substance,

original: 'o na de ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de ci yin zhe na /
translated: then what is it?🔽Therefore, it is said:

original: de'i phyir / khams gsum pa'i las kyis zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /🔽ris @176a * //🔽mthun pa ni de lta bur gyur pa'i 'du byed ci rigs par skye mched drug gi bdag nyid can /
analyzed: de'i phyir / khams gsum pa'i las kyis zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la / ris @176a * // mthun pa ni de lta bur gyur pa'i 'du byed ci rigs par skye mched drug gi bdag nyid can /
translated: The three realms are the six sense bases.

original: rten dang bcas pa de dag kho na yin la /
analyzed: rten dang bcas pa de dag kho na yin la /
translated: The similarity of type is the six sense bases that are the nature of the appropriate formations that arise in that way, along with their support.

original: de gnas pa ni rgyun chags par rjes su 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de gnas pa ni rgyun chags par rjes su 'jug pa'o //
translated: Its duration is the continuation of that stream.

original: de'i dus ni ji srid kyi bar du de rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de'i dus ni ji srid kyi bar du de rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is the period of time during which it continues to exist.

original: de'i 'phen pa ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i skad cig ma la ci rigs par skye ba snga ma'i las kyis rgyu'i dngos por gnas par byas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i 'phen pa ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i skad cig ma la ci rigs par skye ba snga ma'i las kyis rgyu'i dngos por gnas par byas pa'o //
translated: Its projection is the cause that establishes the existence of the prior karma that projects the life of the intermediate beings and the life of the next rebirth.

original: yang rgyu'i dngos po de ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: yang rgyu'i dngos po de ci zhig ce na /
translated: What is the nature of that cause?

original: nus pa ste /
analyzed: nus pa ste /
translated: It is the power of karma.

original: 'di ltar / nying mtshams sbyor ba'i skad cig ma ni las kyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ris mthun pa'i rgyun gyi mtshan nyid can gyis gnas pa'i dus nges pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar / nying mtshams sbyor ba'i skad cig ma ni las kyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ris mthun pa'i rgyun gyi mtshan nyid can gyis gnas pa'i dus nges pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: Thus, the moment of conception is the cause that determines the time of the existence of the continuum that is characterized by the power of karma.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For this reason,

original: gnas pa'i dus kyi 'phen pa zhes bya ste dus de'i rgyun 'phen par byed pa'i phyir ro //🔽'bru rnams kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: gnas pa'i dus kyi 'phen pa zhes bya ste dus de'i rgyun 'phen par byed pa'i phyir ro // 'bru rnams kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: it is called the projection of the time of existence because it projects the continuum of that time.🔽The continuum of the seed is the continuum of the seed, sprout, and so on.

original: dper na sa bon gyi myu gu la gang zhig smin pa'i dus kyi bar du brgyud nas 'bru'i rgyun gyi rgyur 'gyur ba /
analyzed: dper na sa bon gyi myu gu la gang zhig smin pa'i dus kyi bar du brgyud nas 'bru'i rgyun gyi rgyur 'gyur ba /
translated: For example, the seed is the indirect cause of the sprout and so on up to the final fruit.

original: 'bru rnams kyi smin pa'i dus kyi 'phen pa nus pa'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid can bskyed pa de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: 'bru rnams kyi smin pa'i dus kyi 'phen pa nus pa'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid can bskyed pa de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The time of the ripening of the grains is the characteristic of the special potency that generates the ripening.

original: mda' 'phangs pa dag gi gnas pa'i dus kyi 'phen pa bzhin no zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
analyzed: mda' 'phangs pa dag gi gnas pa'i dus kyi 'phen pa bzhin no zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
translated: It is like the time of the flight of an arrow that is projected.

original: de la mda' 'phangs pa'i gnas pa ni yul gzhan du skye ba rgyun rjes su 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de la mda' 'phangs pa'i gnas pa ni yul gzhan du skye ba rgyun rjes su 'jug pa'o //
translated: The flight of an arrow is the continuation of the arising in another place.

original: de'i dus ni gang phyin chad de mi 'byung ba'i mu mtshams so //
analyzed: de'i dus ni gang phyin chad de mi 'byung ba'i mu mtshams so //
translated: The time of that is the limit of the non-arising of that.

original: de'i 'phen pa ni rgyu'i dngos por rnam par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i 'phen pa ni rgyu'i dngos por rnam par gnas pa'o //
translated: The projection of that is the state of being the cause.

original: mda'i skad cig dang po'i de yang rtsol bar gyur pa phul du byung bas bsgrubs pa'i rlung gi khams kyis bskyed pa'i nus pa'i khyad par las so //🔽gang zhig ces bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: mda'i skad cig dang po'i de yang rtsol bar gyur pa phul du byung bas bsgrubs pa'i rlung gi khams kyis bskyed pa'i nus pa'i khyad par las so //🔽gang zhig ces bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: The projection of the first moment of the arrow is from the special potency generated by the wind element that is accomplished by the excellence of the exertion.🔽That which is the cause of the projection of the first moment of the arrow is also the cause of the projection of the second moment of the arrow.

original: bye brag pa ni mda' 'phangs pa la rlung gi khams gyis  bskyed pa'i nus pa'i khyad par las yul dag tu rgyun skye ba'i bdag nyid can mi 'dod pas 'du byed ces bya ba la sogs pa da ltar sems te /
analyzed: bye brag pa ni mda' 'phangs pa la rlung gi khams gyis  bskyed pa'i nus pa'i khyad par las yul dag tu rgyun skye ba'i bdag nyid can mi 'dod pas 'du byed ces bya ba la sogs pa da ltar sems te /
translated: The Vaiśeṣikas do not assert that the continuum of the arrow arises in other places due to a special potency generated by the element of wind.

original: bye brag pa'i ltar na 'gro ba'i phyir na thog mar mda' la las skye la /
analyzed: bye brag pa'i ltar na 'gro ba'i phyir na thog mar mda' la las skye la /
translated: Therefore, according to the Vaiśeṣikas, the action of going arises first in the arrow.

original: de las ni 'gro ba'i rgyu 'du byed do //
analyzed: de las ni 'gro ba'i rgyu 'du byed do //
translated: From that, the cause of going is formation.

original: 'du byed las ni ma ltung gi par du 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: 'du byed las ni ma ltung gi par du 'gro ba'o //
translated: From formation, there is going until it falls.

original: mda'i 'gro ba ni yul gzhan du phyin pa yin gyi /
analyzed: mda'i 'gro ba ni yul gzhan du phyin pa yin gyi /
translated: The going of the arrow is the arrival at another place,

original: skye ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: skye ba ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not arising.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni bye brag pa'i'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni bye brag pa'i'o //
translated: That is, according to the Vaiśeṣikas.

original: de ni gcig pu yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'du byed gcig bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni gcig pu yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'du byed gcig bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is singular means because formation is singular.

original: gegs byed pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gegs byed pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because there is no obstruction means because there is no obstruction to the action of going.

original: nam mkha' la ni reg pa dang ldan pa'i rdzas @176b dang 'brel pa'i bdag nyid can gyi thogs pa 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin na //
analyzed: nam mkha' la ni reg pa dang ldan pa'i rdzas @176b dang 'brel pa'i bdag nyid can gyi thogs pa 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin na //
translated: But there is no obstruction in space, which is related to the substance that is in contact with space.

original: gegs chen po dang / 'bring dang / chung ngu byas na ni 'du byed bye brag med bzhin du phyin pa'i dus kyi bye brag tu 'gyur na /
analyzed: gegs chen po dang / 'bring dang / chung ngu byas na ni 'du byed bye brag med bzhin du phyin pa'i dus kyi bye brag tu 'gyur na /
translated: If there were a great, medium, or small obstruction, then the time of arrival would be different, even though the action is the same.

original: gegs ni yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gegs ni yod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: But there is no obstruction.

original: de'i phyir / yul gzhan dag tu mgyogs pa dang / ches dang / shin tu ches mgyogs par phyin pa'i dus kyi bye brag yod pa'i phyir ma ltung bar du 'gro bar 'du byed gcig pu'i rgyu can ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir / yul gzhan dag tu mgyogs pa dang / ches dang / shin tu ches mgyogs par phyin pa'i dus kyi bye brag yod pa'i phyir ma ltung bar du 'gro bar 'du byed gcig pu'i rgyu can ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because there is a difference in the time of arrival at other places, which is faster, faster still, and fastest of all, it is not the case that the action alone is the cause of going until it falls.

original: ltung ba yang mi 'thad do zhe sa bya ba ni 'du byed gcig pu yin pa'i phyir dang / gegs byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ltung ba yang mi 'thad do zhe sa bya ba ni 'du byed gcig pu yin pa'i phyir dang / gegs byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And it is not tenable that it falls, because the action alone is the cause and there is no obstruction.

original: gal te rlung gis de la gegs byed do zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gal te rlung gis de la gegs byed do zhes bya ba la /
translated: If you say that the wind obstructs it,

original: rlung gis gegs byas pa'i 'du byed ni las chen po dang / 'bring dang / chung ngu'i rgyu yin la /
analyzed: rlung gis gegs byas pa'i 'du byed ni las chen po dang / 'bring dang / chung ngu'i rgyu yin la /
translated: The formative forces obstructed by the wind are the cause of great, middling, and small actions.

original: mthar ni 'du byed med pa'i phyir dang / lci ba nyid kyi phyir ltung ba yin no zhes //
analyzed: mthar ni 'du byed med pa'i phyir dang / lci ba nyid kyi phyir ltung ba yin no zhes //
translated: And finally, they fall because of the absence of formative forces and because of heaviness.

original: drung du ltung ba'am zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: drung du ltung ba'am zhes bya ba la /
translated: They fall in the vicinity, that is,

original: gzhu rgyud dang rnam par bye ma thag tu rlung dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhu rgyud dang rnam par bye ma thag tu rlung dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are immediately followed by the wind that is in conjunction with the earth.

original: 'di ltar reg pa dang ldan pa'i rdzas dang ldan pa las med pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni bye brag pa rnams kyi mdo yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar reg pa dang ldan pa'i rdzas dang ldan pa las med pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni bye brag pa rnams kyi mdo yin no //
translated: In this way, the substance that is in conjunction with contact does not exist without the substance that is not in conjunction with contact. This is the Sūtra of the Vaiśeṣikas.

original: yang na gzhar yang zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yang na gzhar yang zhes bya ba la /
translated: Or else, they never fall.

original: mi ltung bar thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: mi ltung bar thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The consequence is that they do not fall.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i phyir / rlung la khyad par med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / rlung la khyad par med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it says, because there is no difference in the wind.

original: gang las phyis gegs byed kyi sngar ma yin par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: gang las phyis gegs byed kyi sngar ma yin par 'gyur ba /
translated: Because there is no difference in the wind later, when it obstructs, and earlier, when it does not.

original: phyis rlung la khyad par yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phyis rlung la khyad par yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: There is no difference in the wind later.

original: de las khyad par med pa'i phyir ni ldan pa la yang khyad par med do //
analyzed: de las khyad par med pa'i phyir ni ldan pa la yang khyad par med do //
translated: But if the self is not different from the aggregates, then it is not different from the possession of the aggregates.

original: gang zhig las bzhin du 'du byed kyang du ma snyam du sems pa de'i yang yul gzhan du mgyogs pa dang ches dang / shin tu ches mgyogs par phyin pa'i dus kyi bye brag mi 'thad de /
analyzed: gang zhig las bzhin du 'du byed kyang du ma snyam du sems pa de'i yang yul gzhan du mgyogs pa dang ches dang / shin tu ches mgyogs par phyin pa'i dus kyi bye brag mi 'thad de /
translated: If you think that the self is like an action, and that the self is not multiple because the aggregates are not multiple, then the difference in speed of the object in different places is not tenable.

original: 'du byed la ni las brtsam par bya ba la bye brag yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: 'du byed la ni las brtsam par bya ba la bye brag yod pa ma yin la /
translated: The self does not differ in relation to the action that is begun.

original: gang zhig 'du byed ches gsal bas bskyed pa'i las kyis cig car rdzas yul mang po gnon par byed pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig 'du byed ches gsal bas bskyed pa'i las kyis cig car rdzas yul mang po gnon par byed pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: And if the self is not multiple, then the action that is generated by a very clear aggregate cannot simultaneously occupy many substances.

original: rim gyis rang gi rten du rdul phra rab tsam gyi phyogs dang ldan pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim gyis rang gi rten du rdul phra rab tsam gyi phyogs dang ldan pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The self is not generated by the clear aggregate, because it is generated by the cause of purification.

original: bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'di skad du tshe rdzas gzhan kho na cig yod do zhes ni brjod de //
analyzed: bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'di skad du tshe rdzas gzhan kho na cig yod do zhes ni brjod de //
translated: The Vaibhāṣikas say that there is a separate substance called life force.

original: srog drod dang 'dre bar 'byung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: srog drod dang 'dre bar 'byung ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is the support of heat and consciousness.

original: rdzas su med pa la ni 'dre ba mi 'thad do //
analyzed: rdzas su med pa la ni 'dre ba mi 'thad do //
translated: But it is not tenable that what does not exist as a real entity can be exhausted.

original: yang ci tshe zad pa kho nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa @177a * //
analyzed: yang ci tshe zad pa kho nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa @177a * //
translated: If one asks: “Is it only through the exhaustion of life that death occurs?”

original: 'byung ngo // 'on te gzhan du yang yin zhe na zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'byung ngo // 'on te gzhan du yang yin zhe na zhes bya ba la /
translated: and so on, the answer is: “Or else, it is also through other causes.”

original: tshe yod kyang rgyu mtshan gzhan gyis yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tshe yod kyang rgyu mtshan gzhan gyis yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that it is also through other causes when life remains.

original: btags pa las zhes bya ba 'dis ni tshe yod kyang 'chi ba yod do zhes ston par byed do //
analyzed: btags pa las zhes bya ba 'dis ni tshe yod kyang 'chi ba yod do zhes ston par byed do //
translated: The phrase “in the sutra” shows that death occurs even when life remains.

original: dang po ni tshe'i rnam par smin pa can yin gyi /
analyzed: dang po ni tshe'i rnam par smin pa can yin gyi /
translated: The first is the karma that ripens as life,

original: longs spyod kyi rnam par smin pa can ni ma yin te /
analyzed: longs spyod kyi rnam par smin pa can ni ma yin te /
translated: but not the karma that ripens as resources.

original: las kyis 'phangs pa'i srog gi dbang po rgyun yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir tshe'i rnam par smin pa can gyi las yongs su gtugs pa yin no //
analyzed: las kyis 'phangs pa'i srog gi dbang po rgyun yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir tshe'i rnam par smin pa can gyi las yongs su gtugs pa yin no //
translated: This is because the life faculty projected by karma is completely exhausted.

original: gnyis pa ni longs spyod kyi rnam par smin pa can no //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni longs spyod kyi rnam par smin pa can no //
translated: The second is the karma that ripens as resources.

original: las yongs su gtugs pa las so zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: las yongs su gtugs pa las so zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: The phrase “from the exhaustion of karma” should be applied to this.

original: tshe'i rnam par smin pa can ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tshe'i rnam par smin pa can ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the karma that ripens as life.

original: gsum pa ni gnyis ka'o //🔽cho dang longs spyod rnam par smin pa can dag ste /
analyzed: gsum pa ni gnyis ka'o // cho dang longs spyod rnam par smin pa can dag ste /
translated: The third is both.

original: las yongs su zad pa las zhes bya bar sbyar ro //🔽bzhi pa ni tshe dang longs spyod kyi rnam par smin pa can las dag ma zad kyang yang ba yongs su mi spong bas so //
analyzed: las yongs su zad pa las zhes bya bar sbyar ro // bzhi pa ni tshe dang longs spyod kyi rnam par smin pa can las dag ma zad kyang yang ba yongs su mi spong bas so //
translated: It is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.🔽The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.🔽The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.🔽The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.

original: bag med pa spyod pas so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽mar me bzhin te /
analyzed: bag med pa spyod pas so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // mar me bzhin te /
translated: The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.

original: ji ltar mar me ni res 'ga' snying po zad pa nyid las 'gag la /
analyzed: ji ltar mar me ni res 'ga' snying po zad pa nyid las 'gag la /
translated: The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.

original: res 'ga' ni 'bru mar zad pa nyid las yin gyi /🔽snying po zad pa las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: res 'ga' ni 'bru mar zad pa nyid las yin gyi / snying po zad pa las ni ma yin no //
translated: The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.

original: res 'ga' ni gnyis ka zad pa las /🔽res 'ga' ni gnyis ka yod kyang rlung la sogs pas so //
analyzed: res 'ga' ni gnyis ka zad pa las / res 'ga' ni gnyis ka yod kyang rlung la sogs pas so //
translated: The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.

original: tshe btang bas las brjod par bya'o //🔽brjod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: tshe btang bas las brjod par bya'o // brjod par mi bya ste /
translated: The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.🔽The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.🔽The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.🔽The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.🔽The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.🔽The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.🔽The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.🔽The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.🔽The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.🔽The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.🔽The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the life-force and the exhaustion of the enjoyment of possessions.

original: mu dang po'i khongs su 'du ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mu dang po'i khongs su 'du ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The fourth is action that has for its effect the exhaustion of the

original: de'i tshe rnam par smin pa can gyi las gang yin pa de longs spyod kyi rnam par smin par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: de'i tshe rnam par smin pa can gyi las gang yin pa de longs spyod kyi rnam par smin par 'gyur bas /
translated: At that time, karma that is to be experienced as the result of life expectancy ripens as the result of resources.

original: tshe zad pa kho nas 'chi ba yin no //🔽tshe zad na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /🔽longs spyod zad na tshe yod pa yang ltos nas longs spyod zad pas 'chi bar bya ba la /🔽nus pa yod na tshe zad na bzlog par bya ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tshe zad pa kho nas 'chi ba yin no // tshe zad na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la / longs spyod zad na tshe yod pa yang ltos nas longs spyod zad pas 'chi bar bya ba la / nus pa yod na tshe zad na bzlog par bya ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore death occurs only through the exhaustion of life.🔽If resources are exhausted, one dies through the exhaustion of resources,🔽but if life is not exhausted, it is not possible to die through the exhaustion of resources.

original: longs spyod zad pa 'chi bar bya ba la nus pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: longs spyod zad pa 'chi bar bya ba la nus pa de'i phyir /
translated: If life is exhausted, it is not possible to die through the exhaustion of resources.

original: gnyis ka zad pa las zhes bya ba'i mu gsum pa mi rigs te /
analyzed: gnyis ka zad pa las zhes bya ba'i mu gsum pa mi rigs te /

original: tshe zad na bsod nams zad pa la 'chi bar bya ba la nus pa yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tshe zad na bsod nams zad pa la 'chi bar bya ba la nus pa yod pa ni ma yin no //

analyzed: rgyud la rag las te 'jug pa zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar 'di ni dang po'o /
translated: This is the first type.

original: gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams dang / 'dod pa'i khams su 'gog pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la ni rten la gnod pa byas pas tshe la gnod pa med de /
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams dang / 'dod pa'i khams su 'gog pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la ni rten la gnod pa byas pas tshe la gnod pa med de /
translated: The meditative attainments of the form and formless realms, as well as the meditative attainment of cessation and the meditative attainment of nonperception in the desire realm, do not harm life by harming the basis.

original: rang dang gzhan gyi gnod pa'i yul las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang dang gzhan gyi gnod pa'i yul las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they transcend the domain of harm to self and others.

original: de'i phyir de ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni /

analyzed: de ltar skyes pa bzhin gnas par bar skabs su rgyun rnam par 'chad pa med do // gnyis ka yin no zhes bya ba la /

original: snyoms par zhugs pa rnams dang zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar 'di ni gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: snyoms par zhugs pa rnams dang zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar 'di ni gnyis pa'o //
translated: It is not like the meditative attainment of cessation because it is a meditative attainment of the desire realm.

original: glo bur dang bcas pa ni dang po yin no //
analyzed: glo bur dang bcas pa ni dang po yin no //
translated: The meditative attainment of nonperception is like the meditative attainment of cessation in that it is a meditative attainment that does not harm life by harming the basis.

original: de glo bur dang bcas pa ni lus la gnod pa byas pa'i sgo nas te /
analyzed: de glo bur dang bcas pa ni lus la gnod pa byas pa'i sgo nas te /
translated: It is not like the meditative attainment of cessation because it is a meditative attainment of the desire realm.🔽The meditative attainment of nonperception is like the meditative attainment of cessation in that it is a meditative attainment that does not harm life by harming the basis.🔽It is not

original: gegs dang bcas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gegs dang bcas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the phrase “with obstacles” is clear.

original: glo bur med pa ni gnyis pa yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: glo bur med pa ni gnyis pa yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: The second is “without obstacles.”

original: de'i rten la gnod pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni glo bur med cing gegs med pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i rten la gnod pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni glo bur med cing gegs med pa yin no //
translated: Since there is no harm to its basis, it is without obstacles.

original: de lta bas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir tshe rgyud la rag las pa dang / glo bur dang bcas pa bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir tshe rgyud la rag las pa dang / glo bur dang bcas pa bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, untimely death exists, because it is explained that life is dependent on the life-stream and that it is accompanied by obstacles.

original: mdo las zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: mdo las zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: The sutra says, etc.

original: chos mngon pa las bshad pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
analyzed: chos mngon pa las bshad pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
translated: It is not only explained in the Abhidharma.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What does the sutra say?

original: mdo las kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba gsungs so //
analyzed: mdo las kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba gsungs so //
translated: The sutra mentions untimely death.

original: bdag rgyur gyur pa'i 'chi ba ni bdag nyid 'chi ba'o //
analyzed: bdag rgyur gyur pa'i 'chi ba ni bdag nyid 'chi ba'o //
translated: Death that is the cause of one’s own death is death by one’s own hand.

original: gzhan rgyur gyur pa'i 'chi ba ni gzhan gyis gsod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan rgyur gyur pa'i 'chi ba ni gzhan gyis gsod pa'o //
translated: Death that is the cause of the death of another is murder.

original: mu bzhir zhes bya ba 'byung ngo //
analyzed: mu bzhir zhes bya ba 'byung ngo //
translated: There are four possibilities.

original: dang po la /
analyzed: dang po la /
translated: The first is

original: rab tu dga' ba dang / yid rab tu 'khrugs pa dag gis zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba dang / yid rab tu 'khrugs pa dag gis zhes bya ba la /
translated: by those who are extremely happy and those who are extremely disturbed.

original: @178a * // lha rtsed mos myos pa rnams ni rab tu dga' ba ste /
analyzed: @178a * // lha rtsed mos myos pa rnams ni rab tu dga' ba ste /
translated: Those who are extremely happy are the gods who are intoxicated by play.

original: de dag ni shin tu rtse ba dang dga' ba la sogs pas lus dub pa dang / dran pa myos pa dag gis gnas de nas 'chi bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de dag ni shin tu rtse ba dang dga' ba la sogs pas lus dub pa dang / dran pa myos pa dag gis gnas de nas 'chi bar 'gyur /
translated: They die from that place due to the exhaustion of their bodies and the intoxication of their minds from excessive play, enjoyment, and so on.

original: yid rab tu 'khrugs pa rnams ni yid rab tu 'khrugs pa ste /🔽de dag ni phan tshun mig gis mig la bltas pas yid 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: yid rab tu 'khrugs pa rnams ni yid rab tu 'khrugs pa ste / de dag ni phan tshun mig gis mig la bltas pas yid 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing /
translated: Those who are extremely disturbed are the gods who are extremely disturbed.

original: de nas gnas de nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas gnas de nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They die from that place due to the disturbance of their minds from looking at each other with eyes of hatred.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang yin par brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid 'grongs par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang yin par brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid 'grongs par 'gyur gyi /
translated: It should be said that the same is true of the buddhas.🔽This means that they die by their own volition, not by the volition of others.

original: gzhan gyis 'grongs pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o / de nyid la rgyu smras pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyis 'grongs pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o / de nyid la rgyu smras pa ni /
translated: The reason for that is stated:

original: bdag nyid 'grongs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid 'grongs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste /
translated: because they die by their own volition.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnod pa mi mnga' ba'i chos can dang / sku tshe gtong ba la mnga' brnyes pa yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnod pa mi mnga' ba'i chos can dang / sku tshe gtong ba la mnga' brnyes pa yin no //
translated: The Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, are endowed with the quality of being free from harm and they have mastery over the relinquishment of life.

original: gnyis pa ni gzhan gyis gsod pa kho nar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gnyis pa ni gzhan gyis gsod pa kho nar 'gyur gyi /
translated: The second are those who die only through being killed by another.

original: bdag nyid 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba ste /
translated: They do not die on their own.

original: mngal na 'dug pa nur nur po dang / gor gor po dang / mkhrang 'gyur dang / rkang lag 'gyus pa'i gnas skabs na 'dug pa dang / sgo nga na 'dug pa rnams la bdag nyid 'chi ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngal na 'dug pa nur nur po dang / gor gor po dang / mkhrang 'gyur dang / rkang lag 'gyus pa'i gnas skabs na 'dug pa dang / sgo nga na 'dug pa rnams la bdag nyid 'chi ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This refers to those who are in the womb, in the various stages of the embryo, the kalala, etc., and those who are in the egg.

original: gnyis ka ni bdag nyid 'chi ba dang / gzhan gyis gsod pa yin no //
analyzed: gnyis ka ni bdag nyid 'chi ba dang / gzhan gyis gsod pa yin no //
translated: The third are those who die both on their own and through being killed by another.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa gzhan dag ces bya ba ni gang dag bshad par gyur pa las gzhan pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa gzhan dag ces bya ba ni gang dag bshad par gyur pa las gzhan pa rnams so //
translated: The others in the desire realm are those other than those just mentioned.

original: phal cher zhes bya ba smos pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i srid pa bar ma la sogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phal cher zhes bya ba smos pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i srid pa bar ma la sogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The word “mostly” is used because the intermediate beings, etc., who are in the desire realm are excluded.

original: bzhi pa ni gnyis ka ma yin zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bzhi pa ni gnyis ka ma yin zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The fourth is neither.

original: bdag nyid 'chi ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: bdag nyid 'chi ba ma yin zhing /
translated: He does not die by his own hand,

original: gzhan gyis gsod pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis gsod pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: nor is he killed by another.

original: rgyal po'i drang srong dang / chos lan dang / mchog can dang / gang g'a len la sogs pa rnams na sngon gyi gtam rgyud rnams las khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyal po'i drang srong dang / chos lan dang / mchog can dang / gang g'a len la sogs pa rnams na sngon gyi gtam rgyud rnams las khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood from the stories in the sutras, such as those of the royal seer, the one who was repaid for his gift, the one who was supreme, and the one who took the Ganges river as his bow.

original: rgyal ba'i pho nya ni ji srid pho nya'i don ma byas pa de srid du bdag nyid 'chi ba ma yin zhing /🔽gzhan gyis gsod par mi 'gyur ro //🔽rgyal bas bstan pa ni dus 'di srid cig gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i dus de srid du bdag nyid 'chi ba yang ma yin la /
analyzed: rgyal ba'i pho nya ni ji srid pho nya'i don ma byas pa de srid du bdag nyid 'chi ba ma yin zhing / gzhan gyis gsod par mi 'gyur ro // rgyal bas bstan pa ni dus 'di srid cig gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i dus de srid du bdag nyid 'chi ba yang ma yin la /
translated: The messenger of the Victor does not die by his own hand nor is he killed by another, as long as he has not accomplished the purpose of the messenger.🔽The Victor’s teacher does not die by his own hand nor is he killed by another, as long as he has not accomplished the purpose of the teacher.🔽The Victor’s pupil does not die by his own hand nor is he killed by another, as long as he has not accomplished the purpose of the pupil.🔽The Victor’s exhorter does not die by his own hand nor is he killed by another, as long as he has not accomplished the purpose of the exhorter.🔽The Victor’s witness does not die by his own hand nor is he killed by another, as long as he has not accomplished the purpose of the witness.

original: gzhan gyis gsod par yang mi 'gyur ro //🔽srid pa tha ma pa zhes bya ba ni gang gis skye ba de nyid la @178b dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyis gsod par yang mi 'gyur ro //🔽srid pa tha ma pa zhes bya ba ni gang gis skye ba de nyid la @178b dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: The one in his last existence does not die by his own hand nor is he killed by another, as long as he has not accomplished the purpose of the one in his last existence.

original: de dag de ma 'thob par bdag nyid 'chi bar yang mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: de dag de ma 'thob par bdag nyid 'chi bar yang mi 'gyur la /
translated: They do not die before obtaining it, nor are they killed by others.

original: gzhan gyis gsod par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyis gsod par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not die before obtaining it, nor are they killed by others.

original: de lhums na gnas pa zhes bya ba la ji srid byang chub sems dpa' lhums na gnas pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba mngal na gnas pa de srid du yum bdag nyid 'chi bar mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: de lhums na gnas pa zhes bya ba la ji srid byang chub sems dpa' lhums na gnas pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba mngal na gnas pa de srid du yum bdag nyid 'chi bar mi 'gyur la /
translated: While the Bodhisattva is in the womb, and while the Cakravartin is in the womb, the mother does not die,

original: gzhan gyis gsod par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyis gsod par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: nor is she killed by others.

original: yang ci'i phyir mdo las btsun pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir mdo las btsun pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
translated: Why is it that the mother of the Bodhisattva does not die after seven days?

original: bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa gzhan dag na ni zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa gzhan dag na ni zhes bya ba la /
translated: In the other absorptions and formless states,

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min las gzhan pa bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa dag na ni nyon mongs pa gzhom bar bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid 'chi ba ni rang gis pa'i 'phags pa'i lam la brjod do //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min las gzhan pa bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa dag na ni nyon mongs pa gzhom bar bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid 'chi ba ni rang gis pa'i 'phags pa'i lam la brjod do //
translated: in the other absorptions and formless states, other than the base of neither perception nor non-perception, the noble path of their own level is said to be the cause of death in order to eliminate afflictions.

original: gzhan gyis gsod pa ni nyon mongs pa gzhom pa kho na'i dbang du byas nas sa gong ma'i nyer bsdogs yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis gsod pa ni nyon mongs pa gzhom pa kho na'i dbang du byas nas sa gong ma'i nyer bsdogs yin te /
translated: The phrase “it is killed by another” refers to access concentration to higher levels, which is only for the purpose of subduing afflictions.

original: des sa 'og ma dag las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des sa 'og ma dag las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that access concentration to higher levels is the antidote to the afflictions of lower levels.

original: des na gnyis ka med do zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: des na gnyis ka med do zhes bya ba la /
translated: Therefore it is said that neither exist in the base of neither discernment nor nondiscernment.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched na ni rang gis pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yang med pa nyid la /🔽sa gong ma'i nyer bsdogs kyang med de /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched na ni rang gis pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yang med pa nyid la / sa gong ma'i nyer bsdogs kyang med de /
translated: In the base of neither discernment nor nondiscernment, the ārya path of its level does not exist and

original: de'i gong nas gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i gong nas gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: access concentration to higher levels does not exist because there is nothing higher than it.

original: de stan 'o na de na yang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: de stan 'o na de na yang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: If that is so, then it is said:

original: de na yang mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gzhan gyis gsod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de na yang mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gzhan gyis gsod par 'gyur te /
translated: It is killed by another, the ārya path of the level of unrestricted access concentration.

original: 'di ltar zag pa med pa'i mi lcogs pa med pas thams cad las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam sa brgyad pos rang dang / gong ma'i sa las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'dod pa dang / srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa'i phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyis ci yang med pa'i skye mched mngon du byas par gyur pa las zag pa zad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar zag pa med pa'i mi lcogs pa med pas thams cad las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam sa brgyad pos rang dang / gong ma'i sa las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'dod pa dang / srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa'i phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyis ci yang med pa'i skye mched mngon du byas par gyur pa las zag pa zad pa yin no //
translated: and nonreturners who are born in the summit of existence manifest the base of nothingness and then they exhaust their contaminants.

original: 'o na ni mtha' smos pas de la sogs pa go'o zhes bya ba la /🔽'dir mtha' ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched do //
analyzed: 'o na ni mtha' smos pas de la sogs pa go'o zhes bya ba la / 'dir mtha' ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched do //
translated: If you say that the term “and so on” refers to the base of neither discrimination nor nondiscrimination,🔽then the term “and so on” refers to the base of neither discrimination nor nondiscrimination, which is the limit.

original: de la sogs pa ni de la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de la sogs pa ni de la sogs pa ste /
translated: The term “and so on” refers to the base of infinite consciousness and so on.

original: mnyam par gzhag pa nyid du mtshungs pa'i phyir bsam gtan dang po'i bar yin gyi /
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa nyid du mtshungs pa'i phyir bsam gtan dang po'i bar yin gyi /
translated: The term “and so on” refers to the first absorption and so on, because they are similar in being equipoise.

original: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams ni ma yin no //
translated: But the desire realm is not included because it is not equipoise.

original: de la sogs pa go ba ni de la sogs pa go ba'o //
analyzed: de la sogs pa go ba ni de la sogs pa go ba'o //
translated: The term “and so on” refers to the understanding of the base of infinite consciousness and so on.

original: srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa ltar de la sogs par skyes pa rnams @179a * //
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa ltar de la sogs par skyes pa rnams @179a * //
translated: Those born in the summit of existence and so on are like those born in the first absorption.

original: kyang bdag nyid 'chi bar mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: kyang bdag nyid 'chi bar mi 'gyur la /
translated: They do not die by their own accord.

original: gzhan gyis gsod par yang mi 'gyur ro //🔽gzhan las kyang de lta bu'i mtshan nyid can gyis bstan pa yod do zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan gyis gsod par yang mi 'gyur ro // gzhan las kyang de lta bu'i mtshan nyid can gyis bstan pa yod do zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
